content: Here's what customer Michael Krause partnered Atrium Management Company in Orlando, with approximately 3000 units on AppFolio Property Manager says, âWe have always used best in class software for specific functions and we're so excited that AppFolio is integrating with more partnersâ This is truly assignment AppFolio is dedicated to partnering with property managers and best-in-class software vendors to provide the end user with the best experience possible. In addition to the number of units we serve, it is important to note that core revenue also grew as we continue to focus on customers with larger unit portfolios that drive higher adoption rates of AppFolio Property Manager Plus.
